Straight Shot tries desperately to communicate with Leo and Rodimus as does=
 Quickstride, who's face still shows shock.  The duo never intended to walk=
 in on a creature as large as Hydras, nor did they expect to see anything s=
imilar in species.  Although the dragon never made any motions to harm them=
, it was to them, still cause of alarm.  The sound of Quickstride's hooves =
grabs Tucson's attention as well, since he had already been awakened by his=
 dream.  Quietly he makes his way out of the room and finds his way to the =
severely terrified duo.

"Leo, Rodimus, I'm with Quickstride and Straight S=
hot now.  Meet me near the CR chamber room.   Whatever sent them into a pan=
ic has to be big, very big."

Quickstride comes to a short stop in front of=
 Tucson, not expecting to see him either.

" HEY!  You're supposed ta be in=
 CR!" 

Tucson tries to calm the spooked stallion.

" Shhh.  I know, it's a=
ll right, I woke up on my own.  Now, what happened?"

Straight Shot looks t=
o her brother.

" We went to survey the construction site for the wind turb=
ine and we went into the cave where the turbine is gonna be installed..."

=
Quickstride now speaks up.

" At first it looked deserted, but well.. It's =
not. It has a tenant, a very big tenant".

Straight Shot struggles to keep =
her composure.

" We heard this grumbling noise that actually vibrated the =
cave and no sooner did we hear it, out comes this huge reptilian animal cov=
ered with silver scales and large wings, and a really long tail.  We didn't=
 hang around long enough ta find out if it was dangerous or not.  All we kn=
ew, it was enormous, had the same features as Hydras, but with only one hea=
d and it had really big teeth and claws."

Tucson stumbles back in surprise=
.

" You - just described something I saw in a dream I just woke up from."
=

The duo stare at him in shock.  Neither one of them able to move or speak.=


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 3, 2011, at 12:33 P=
M, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD - Straight Sho=
t & Quickstride>
> >
> > He quickly gets into beast mode as Straight Shot h=
ops on his back. And as
> > the occupant of the cave emerges, they are now =
greeted by a large draconic
> > creature but waste no time in fleeing the a=
rea. Quickstride bolts back into
> > the Ark with as much terror as Straigh=
t Shot as they both scream;
> >
> > "LEO, RODIMUS PRIME!"
> >
> > Truly the=
 duo had been severely spooked by the dragon's presence.
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> Th=
ere is a response via comlink from LEO PRIME, "I read you STRAIGHT
> SHOT a=
nd QUICKSTRIDE. What's going on out there?" There is a measure
> of concern=
 in his voice tempered by years of warrior's calm.
> 
> RODIMUS' voice cut =
in, "I am on my way!" Ever the one to jump when
> things need to happen.
> =

> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
>
